message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80. Would you like to make it yours? Our initial offer is $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $85?
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback. Our counteroffer is $85 for the product. We hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to consider this price?
We understand your perspective, Bob. Our next offer for the product is $80. We hope this meets within your budget and allows us to close the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $80, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Considering your feedback, Bob, we are now offering the product at $79. We hope this price is acceptable for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $79, but I was thinking more along the lines of $77. Would you be willing to consider this price?
After careful consideration, Bob, we are now offering the product at $78. We hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $78, but I was thinking more along the lines of $76. Would you be willing to consider this price?
